BEGenericHeaderAndConentBody.txt_HTML:
Day 1: Be transferred to your harbourside hotel in a series of 1950s classic cars and Cadillacs, then head out for a seafood lunch at Darling Harbour. That afternoon, hop on a Harley motorcycle to tour Sydney’s ‘must-see’ places, including Bondi Beach and the fashionable eastern suburbs. Dine tonight in one of Sydney’s world-renowned restaurants.

Day 2: See Sydney from a whole new angle with a Sydney Harbour Bridge Climb. After seeing the city from 134 metres above the harbour, enjoy a gourmet Asian lunch, and head to the Sydney Opera House for a private tour. That evening, take off from Circular Quay on a sunset cruise to one of the Harbour’s many islands for an exclusive dinner.

Day 3: It’s time to head out to one of the Sydney’s wonderful daytrips: the World Heritage Blue Mountains; the gorgeous long, white beaches of the Central Coast; wine tasting in the Hunter Valley; outdoor and water activities at Port Stephens; or a trip along the cliffs to the coastal city of Wollongong.

Day 4: You can shop till you drop in any number of Sydney’s shopping hotspots this morning, before a fabulous lunch in the heart of the CBD. You’ll then see Sydney, its harbour, beaches and stunning sandstone cliffs on a seaplane tour from Rose Bay. That evening, your farewell dinner will be either the Diva Transfer with Portia Turbo or a themed farewell dinner at one of Sydney’s outstanding spaces, such as from Luna Park, one of the historic finger wharves, or Dockside overlooking Darling Harbour.
